description: CO2 emissions driven SSP5-3.4 overshoot scenario simulation optionally extending to year 2300 (part of the CDR-overshoot experiment). The scenario follows SSP5-8.5, an unmitigated baseline scenario, through 2040, and then substantially negative net emissions thereafter.  All anthropogenic, solar, and volcanic forcing. Anthropogenic forcing includes aerosol emissions, non-CO2 greenhouse gas emissions, and land use changes.  CO2 concentration calculated (i.e. emission driven).
rationale: Evaluate the Earth system response to carbon dioxide removal (CDR) in an overshoot climate change scenario.

requirements.description: Run from 2015 to at least the end of the 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2100 86yrs min

requirements.description: Run from 2015 for a maximum of 5000 years.
requirements.label: 2015-7014 5000yrs max

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model with biogeochemistry
requirements.keywords: AOGCM, BioGeoChemistry, AOGCM-BGC, Atmosphere-Ocean General Circulation Model
requirements.label: AOGCM-BGC Configuration
